All Classes

Class Description
AABBCollider
An axis-aligned bounding-box collider (rectangle)
AABBPairCollisionHandler
Responsible for computing and caching the intersection data of two GameObjects whose colliders are AABBs (axis-aligned bounding-boxes).
AnimationRenderable
A dynamic, repeating animation.
Camera
Represents a view of the world.
Collider
Represents a general shape which specific shapes of GameObjects implement.
Collision
Stores information regarding a given collision between two GameObjects
CollisionResolver
Responsible for preventing two GameObjects from intersecting, provided they're configured to not intersect.
Component
Represents a function that should be executed in a GameObject in each update
ConcatIterator<E>
A package-private class required for the implementation of ModifiableList.
CoordinateSpace
Enum for selecting the coordinate system of a GameObject
Counter
A simple class implementing a counter.
FPSCounter
A factory for a GameObject that displays the frames-per-second.
GameGUIComponent
The class depends on a GameManager it receives in the constructor: it calls GameManager's initializeGame()), update() and render() methods.
GameManager
The principle class of the game.
GameObject
Represents an object in the game.
GameObjectCollection
A container for accumulating/removing instances of GameObject and for handling their collisions.
GameObjectPhysics
Encapsulates the physics-related attributes of a GameObject
ImageReader
Used to read images from disk or from within a jar
ImageRenderable
A simple renderable - a still image.
Layer
Container class for constants representing layer id's
LayerManager
Responsible for the layers mechanism, which separates GameObjects to layers.
ModifiableList<E>
Represents a list that can be modified while iterated, as opposed to Java's builtin lists
MouseAction
An enum for the mouse's possible actions
MouseActionParams
Encapsulated information regarding a mouse action.
MouseButton
Lists the different mouse buttons
MutableVector2
A mutable 2D vector, extending Vector2.
OvalRenderable
An oval Renderable.
PairCollisionData
An abstract class that represents the computing and caching of data regarding the collision of two objects.
PairCollisionHandler
Responsible for the collision detection (and not resolution!) of two GameObjects.
RectangleRenderable
A rectangle Renderable.
Renderable
Represents a visual representation of a game object
RendererComponent
Encapsulates the rendering properties and abilities of a GameObject
ScheduledTask
A component for scheduling a task for execution at a later time
Sound
Represents a sound (sound-effect or music)
SoundReader
Class for reading Sounds from the disk or from within a jar
TextRenderable
A simple class for rendering strings
TextRenderable.MultilineHandling
Possible behaviors of multiline strings in regard to the specified rendering size
Transform
Encapsulates some properties of a GameObject that are related to its transform from object-space to world-space
Transition<T>
Transition a value over a range
Transition.Interpolator<T>
Represents an interpolator, which receives an initial value, a final value, and a t parameter between 0 and 1, and returns the in-between value at t
Transition.TransitionType
Type of transition
UserInputListener
An interface for reading user input in the current frame
Vector2
An immutable class representing a 2D vector.
WindowController
Provides control and info regarding the game.
